title: The marrovv of the oracles of God. Or, diuers treatises containing directions about sixe of the waightiest things can concerne a Christian in this life. by N. Bifield, late preacher of Gods Word at Isleworth in Middlesex.
author: Byfield, Nicholas, 1579-1622.
publisher: Printed by John Legatt, and are to bee sold by P. Stephens, and C. Meredith, at the golden Lyon in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Cambridge University Library copy has part 1 of STC 4229 added in its proper place but retains the 2E8r sub title page: Principles, fourth edition, I. Legatt for R. Allen, 1630.--Cf. STC.
In 6 parts, each with separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
